display_name: Childhood Adenotonsillectomy Trial (CHAT) Apnea-Hypopnea Index (AHI) - Obstructive and Mixed Apnea-Hypopnea Index (NREM): (Obstructive apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ mixed apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation or arousal) / hour of NREM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events. Will be missing if Total Sleep Time (TST) is 0.
calculation: 60 * (oanbp + oanop + manrbp + manrop + hnrba3 + hnroa3) / (slpprdp - minremp)
